name: Two Days Mini Brief about my life Singing or Noise
name_original: Two Days Mini Brief about my life Singing or Noise
description:
Game Singing or Noise is inspired by an experience that I avoid singing louder when taking a shower. I am always concerned about whether my voice disturbs the neighbor and becomes noise. The little bird in the right corner is a symbol of myself~

This game is a little homework that makes in two days and will be improved in the future.

I wish this game could make you smile.
